entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
